member.name: T:Scissors.Data.ExpressionHelper`1
member.summary: Helper-Class to generate strongly typed [Operands](https://documentation.devexpress.com/CoreLibraries/DevExpress.Data.Filtering.OperandProperty.members) and PropertyPaths

member.name: M:Scissors.Data.ExpressionHelper`1.Property``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,``0}})
member.summary: Returns a PropertyPath. Multiple nestings are allowed. `Exp.Property(p => p.A.B.C)` returns `"A.B.C"`
